src:
Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Ayam Legendaris di Bandung yang Kenikmatannya Teruji Zaman
06 Nov 2019, 10:20 by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Foto: Istimewa

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak Jakarta - Mie ayam legendaris di Bandung sudah ada yang berjualan sejak tahun 1947. Tiap tempat menawarkan racikan khas yang sayang dilewatkan penggemar mie ayam.Bandung menjadi surga kuliner yang menawarkan banyak makanan dan camilan enak. Para penggemar mie ayam dijamin tak akan kecewa saat berkunjung ke kota kembang ini. Sebab ada banyak penjual mie ayam enak yang bisa dicoba.Lokasinya ada yang di kaki lima atau menempati bangunan sendiri. Harganya per porsinya bervariasi, mulai dari sekitar Rp 15.000 sampai Rp 50.000-an. Masing-masing mie ayam ini diberi pelengkap tersendiri.Tak hanya suiran ayam atau lembaran sawi rebus, ada juga bakso, pangsit, tahu, hingga ceker. Bagi penggemar mie ayam yang mau coba mie ayam legendaris di Bandung, mampir saja ke 5 tempat ini.Baca Juga: Ngeunah Pisan! 5 Mie Ayam Gerobakan Paling Hits dan Enak di Bogor (adr/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Instagram almaviva

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
1. Mie Baso AkungBerlokasi di Jalan Lodaya No. 123, Buahbatu ada Mie Baso Akung yang sudah berdiri sejak tahun 1990an. Racikan mie baso di sini terkenal enak apalagi Mie Baso Akung pernah jadi bagian film Dilan 1990 yang disaksikan jutaan penonton. Ada dua menu andalan di sini yaitu mie kuah atau yamin.Semuanya dilengkapi suwiran ayam yang lembut dan gurih. Khusus yamin, pengunjung bisa pesan mau yamin manis, sedang, atau yamin asin. Sementara untuk isian, Mie Baso Akung punya singkatan unik yaitu BPTSC. Pengunjung boleh pesan lengkap atau memilih sendiri favoritnya.B untuk bakso, P untuk pangsit, T untuk Tahu, S untuk Siomay, dan C untuk Ceker. Kalau mau pesan pelengkap ini dalam porsi tersendiri juga bisa. Harga yang ditawarkan mulai dari Rp 14.000 sampai Rp 48.000 untuk mie kuah atau yamin. Porsinya besar sehingga dijamin memuaskan!
(adr/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: iStock

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
2. Toko YouMenyebut mie ayam legendaris di Bandung tak bisa meninggalkan Toko You. Sebab tempat makan ini sudah ada sejak tahun 1947. Hingga sekarang Toko You masih menawarkan tempat bersantap dengan suasana klasik sehingga ramai dikunjungi orang.Toko You menghadirkan banyak pilihan makanan, seperti rawon panggang, ayam goreng saos mentega, sampai udang ca sayur asin. Untuk mie tersedia dalam pilihan mie, bihun, atau kwetiau. Pelengkapnya juga sayang dilewatkan.Pengunjung bisa pilih baso sapi, baso ikan, baso tahu, siomay, pangsit rebus, pangsit goreng, dan baso goreng. Harga per porsinya mulai dari Rp 40.000. Kalau bingung memilih diantara mie, bihun, atau kwetiau, tersedia menu paduan keduanya. Seperti 1/2 mie + 1/2 bihun kuah atau 1/2 yamin + 1/2 kwetiau kering. Toko You berlokasi di Jl. Hasanudin No.12, Lebakgede.
(adr/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Instagram makansurga

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
3. Rumah Makan LinggarjatiRumah Makan Linggarjati ada di Jalan Balonggede No. 1, Pungkur. Sudah ada sejak tahun 1950an, di sini terkenal dengan racikan mie yamin nikmat. Ada pilihan manis atau asin yang sama-sama menggugah selera.Seporsi mie dilengkapi topping ayam suir, cincangan daun bawang, dan seledri. Banyak orang menyukai racikan mie homemade Linggarjati yang dibalut bumbu gurih ringan. Toppingnya bisa pilih pangsit, bakso, dan babat.Harga Mie Bakso Pangsit di sini lumayan mahal yaitu sekitar Rp 53.000, sedangkan Mie Bakso Siomay Rp 73.000. Usai makan mie ayam, jangan lewatkan es alpukat yang terkenal enak di sini.
(adr/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: Instagram galleryg6

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
4. Mie Ayam Baso CipagantiMie ayam enak tak selamanya mahal. Di kawasan Cipaganti, ada mie ayam gerobakan yang selalu diburu penggemar mie. Buka sejak pukul 8 pagi, Mie Ayam Baso Cipaganti kerap ramai diantre pengunjung. Harga per porsi mienya sekitar Rp 15.000 saja.Mie disajikan bersama lembaran sawi rebus, suiran ayam plus jamur, bakso kecil, dan bakso urat. Karena lokasinya kecil di pinggir jalan, makan di Mie Ayam Baso Cipaganti tak bisa berlama-lama karena harus bergantian dengan pengunjung lain.Mie ayam gerobakan ini tutup sekitar pukul 5 sore. Agar tak kehabisan, pastikan mampir ke sini sebelum terlalu sore.
(adr/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
Mie Gerobak Enak


Foto: dok. detikFood

FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
5. Mie Rica KejaksaanLebih dari 30 tahun, Mie Rica Kejaksaan di Jalan Kejaksaan No. 7 jadi tujuan penggemar mie untuk puaskan selera. Menu andalan mereka adalah mie rica atau mie pedas ber-topping daging babi. Tersedia dalam pilihan asin pedas atau manis pedas. Ada pula mie ayam dan mie udang sebagai pilihan.Untuk mie ayam, pengunjung bisa pilih yamin asin atau yamin manis. Mie juga bisa diganti bihun. Namun meski namanya mie ayam, mie di sini nonhalal karena menggunakan minyak babi.Mie Baso Sapi dibanderol sekitar Rp 34.000. Mie-nya diracik dari mie berukuran besar mirip mie kuning. Teksturnya tebal dan gendut. Potongan ayamnya berukuran lumayan besar dengan rasa gurih. Kalau ke sini, jangan lewatkan bakso udang goreng yang juga enak.Baca Juga: Mie Rica Kejaksaan: Huahh! Sedapnya Sengatan Mie Pedas Topping Bakso Udang Goreng
(adr/odi)FOKUS BERITA Mie Gerobak Enak
text:
Delicious Noodle Carts
Legendary Chicken Noodle in Bandung, whose enjoyment is time tested
Nov 6 2019, 10:20 AM by Andi Annisa Dwi Rahmawati - detikFood


Photo: Special

NEWS FOCUS NEW Mie Gerobak Enak Jakarta - Legendary chicken noodles in Bandung have been selling since 1947. Each place offers a distinctive blend that is unfortunately missed by chicken noodle fans. It is a culinary paradise that offers a lot of delicious food and snacks. Chicken noodle fans are guaranteed not to be disappointed when visiting this flower city. Because there are many delicious chicken noodle sellers to try. Some of them are located on the street or occupy their own building. The price varies per portion, ranging from around Rp. 15,000 to Rp. 50,000. Each chicken noodle is given its own complement. Not only shredded chicken or boiled mustard greens, there are also meatballs, dumplings, tofu, to claw. For chicken noodle fans who want to try the legendary chicken noodle in Bandung, just stop by these 5 places. Also Read: Ngeunah Pisan! 5 Most Delicious and Delicious Chicken Cart Noodle in Bogor (adr / odi) NEWS FOCUS NEW Delicious Gerobak Noodle
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Instagram almaviva

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
1. Mie Baso Akung, Located on Jalan Lodaya No. 123, Buahbatu is Mie Baso Akung which has been established since the 1990s. Baso noodle concoction here is famous for delicious especially Baso Akung Noodle was once a part of the 1990 Dilan film which was watched by millions of viewers. There are two mainstay menus here namely noodle soup or yamin. Everything is equipped with shredded chicken that is soft and savory. Especially for yamin, visitors can order yamin sweet, medium, or salty yamin. As for the stuffing, Mie Baso Akung has a unique abbreviation namely BPTSC. Visitors can order in full or choose their own favorites. B for meatballs, P for dumplings, T for Tofu, S for Siomay, and C for Ceker. If you want to order these supplements in a separate portion, you can. Prices start from Rp. 14,000 to Rp. 48,000 for soup noodles or yamin. The portions are large so it is guaranteed to be satisfying!
(adr / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Delicious Gerobak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: iStock

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
2. You Shop Calling the legendary chicken noodle in Bandung can not leave You Store. Because this place has been around since 1947. Until now, You Shop still offers a place to eat with a classic atmosphere that is crowded by people. You shop presents many food choices, such as roasted rawon, fried chicken, butter sauce, until shrimp and salted vegetables. For noodles available in a choice of noodles, vermicelli, or noodles. Complement is also unfortunately passed. Visitors can choose beef meatballs, fish meatballs, tofu meatballs, dumplings, boiled dumplings, fried dumplings, and fried meatballs. Prices per portion start from IDR 40,000. If you are confused choosing between noodles, vermicelli, or noodles, there is a combination menu of both. Like 1/2 noodles + 1/2 vermicelli or 1/2 yamin + 1/2 dried rice noodles. You shop is located on Jl. Hasanudin No.12, Lebakgede.
(adr / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Delicious Gerobak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Instagram dinner

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
3. Linggarjati Restaurant Linggarjati Restaurant is on Jalan Balonggede No. 1, Pungkur. It has been around since the 1950s, here it is famous for its delicious yamin noodle concoctions. There are sweet or salty choices that are equally appetizing. The noodle portion comes with a chicken flaky topping, chopped green onion, and celery. Many people love the homemade Linggarjati concoction wrapped in light savory spices. The topping can choose dumplings, meatballs, and tripe. The price of Noodle Meatballs Dumplings here are quite expensive at around Rp. 53,000, while the Siomay Meatballs are Rp. 73,000. After eating chicken noodles, don't miss the famous delicious avocado ice here.
(adr / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Delicious Gerobak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: Instagram galleryg6

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
4. Baso Cipaganti Chicken Noodle Noodle tasty chicken is not always expensive. In the Cipaganti area, there are chicken cart noodles that are always hunted by noodle fans. Open since 8 am, Mie Ayam Baso Cipaganti is often crowded with visitors. The price per portion of the noodle is around Rp. 15,000. Mi is served with boiled mustard greens, chicken shreds plus mushrooms, small meatballs, and vein meatballs. Because of its small location on the side of the road, eating at Cipaganti Chicken Noodle can not linger because you have to take turns with other visitors. The chicken chicken cart closes around 5 pm So as not to run out, make sure to stop by here before it is too late.
(adr / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Delicious Gerobak
Delicious Noodle Carts


Photo: dock. detikFood

NEWS FOCUS Delicious Mie Gerobak
5. Rica Rica Prosecutor's Office For more than 30 years, Rica Rica Prosecutor's Office on Jalan Kejaksaan No. 7 is the goal of noodle fans to satisfy the taste buds. Their mainstay menu is rica noodles or spicy pork toppings. Available in salty spicy or sweet spicy choices. There are also chicken noodles and shrimp noodles as options. For chicken noodles, visitors can choose salty yamin or sweet yamin. Noodles can also be replaced with vermicelli. But despite the name chicken noodle, the noodle here is non-halal because it uses pork oil. Cow Baso Cow is priced around Rp 34,000. The noodles are made from large noodles resembling yellow noodles. Thick and fat texture. The pieces of chicken are quite large with a savory taste. If you come here, do not miss the fried shrimp meatballs that are also delicious. Also Read: Attorney Rica Noodles: Huahh! The delicious taste of Spicy Noodle Noodle Topping Fried Shrimp Meatballs
(adr / odi) FOCUS NEWS Mie Gerobak Enak
